definition: just at the time of/honest/upright/(math.) positive value
first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
value/(to be) worth/to happen to/to be on duty

sentences.english: My teenaged nephew's face is covered with zits.
sentences.chinese: 我那正值青春期的侄子臉上長滿青春痘。

sentences.english: This was September. The bookstore, hot and stuffy.
sentences.chinese: 那時正值九月，書店裏又熱又悶。

sentences.english: This sentence, of course, comes at a time when US-North Korean relations are already tense.
sentences.chinese: 當然，這次審判的時間正值美朝兩國關係緊張之時。

sentences.english: The visit came at a time of serious escalation in the Israel-Palestine conflict and the Middle East situation has raised serious concern of the world community.
sentences.chinese: 此訪正值以巴衝突嚴重升級，中東局勢引起世人關注。

sentences.english: Last month I visited Beijing for a Sino-European summit during the Beijing music festival.
sentences.chinese: 上個月正值北京音樂界，我去北京參加了中歐峯會。

sentences.english: The bombs went off in the hotels' restaurants during breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 爆炸發生在酒店餐廳，當時正值早餐時間。

sentences.english: The day being wintry and cold, the Man put his fingers to his mouth and blew upon them.
sentences.chinese: 正值冬季，天氣很冷，那人把手放在嘴邊哈氣。

sentences.english: The second derivative, they say, is turning positive.
sentences.chinese: 他們說二階導數轉爲正值了。

sentences.english: Indonesia is the rainy season, torrential rains in many areas.
sentences.chinese: 印尼目前正值雨季，許多地區暴雨成災。

sentences.english: While the Queen Mother was eating dinner, Protestants burst in to demand justice.
sentences.chinese: 正值王太后用餐時，新教徒們衝了進去要求伸張正義。

sentences.english: This film is released on the Chinese mainland in the Year of the Sheep.
sentences.chinese: 該片在中國大陸上映的時期正值羊年。

sentences.english: That girl student is in the green.
sentences.chinese: 那女學生正值豆蔻年華。

sentences.english: The next time was in New York at the turn of the millenium.
sentences.chinese: 我經歷的下一次泡沫是在紐約，當時正值千年之交。

sentences.english: In 1950, 5% of men at the prime working age were unemployed.
sentences.chinese: 1950年，正值壯年的男性只有5%沒有就業。

sentences.english: The attention is focused on the counter-flooding scheme optimization while the initial stability height is positive.
sentences.chinese: 研究了初穩性高爲正值時的優化抗沉方案。

sentences.english: The 9th lunar month, with clear autumn sky and bracing air, is a good time for sightseeing.
sentences.chinese: 陰曆9月這天，正值秋高氣爽，適合旅行觀光。
